```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
x <- seq(0:10)
lamdas <- c(.5, 2, 5)

d1 <- expand_grid(lamdas, x) %>% 
  mutate(Mass = dpois(x = x, lambda = lamdas))


ggplot(d1, aes(x, Mass))+
  geom_point() + 
  geom_segment(aes(x=x, xend=x, y=0, yend=Mass))+
  facet_grid(rows = vars(lamdas))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = x)

```
